transcripts.text: We can get you some more people because I got at least three more people that I want to talk to you before we get to the end of the show.  So I'm just going to go ahead and get our next person on.  I have no idea how to pronounce your name.  Is this Oriax in Pennsylvania?
It's Oriax.  Oriax.  Yes.
That's a cool name.  I like the name Oriax.  Welcome to Truth Wanted.  Thanks.
So first of all, Ray, for Valentine's Day, I want to try a line on you, Dan.  So I was going to say, hey, Dan, I think you're objectively handsome.  Yes.
I love it.  That is great.  Thank you for that.  Thank you so much.
He is.  It's the tie.
It's the tie.  Maybe I need to wear the tie more often.  I don't know, but...

Are you talking about the history of like American occultism, maybe like pagan occultism or just like, you know, like what, where, where have you been looking at?

So I use forms of chaos magic, actually. Wait, wait, okay, wait, hold on.  Wait, we got to explore this a little bit more.  So like people get like talismans or something?
Are you talking about like D&D or something like that?
No.
Sorry, that's a terrible joke.

Yeah, I know.  But like there – yeah, a lot of these circles, the people that explain these, they – They put them forward as if they really work or not, and they usually leave it up to the person who's reading it to discover if they work or not.  They kind of leave it up to being tested.
Well, that's interesting.  Okay, so just the practitioner just has to kind of figure out if it works for them, and if it works for them, they just kind of do it?
Yeah, and then they share it.  Because like the whole idea is to keep sharing them if they work.  If they don't work, it kind of takes them out of the gene pool.

Okay, so like the peer review process here is just kind of, all right, I did this thing and it kind of worked for me.  See if somebody else, if it works for them, like is that kind of how you confirm if it's real or not?
That's – yeah, kind of, yeah.  I would say so.

I think so.
I think.

I mean, I guess... I don't know.  I guess that would be just like an enchanted item, I guess you could say.
